letters.description: Evaluate the client's current energetic state and identify specific vibrational blockages or imbalances within the auric field.
Prepare the client's bio-field and the healing environment through ritual cleansing and focused intention setting.
Curate a specific set of minerals based on their unique chemical composition, lattice structure, and metaphysical resonance.
Strategically arrange selected crystals on chakras, meridians, or geometric grids to facilitate optimal energy flow.
Facilitate the vibrational shift as the crystals interact with the client to absorb, diffuse, or amplify subtle energies.
Ground the newly shifted energy into the physical body to ensure lasting emotional and spiritual integration.
